t: Customer states missing parts on return, I received the item and seems parts are broken not missing what is the best way to handle this so I can get some money back.
s: I shipped a new product, Customer returned 2 days after getting it and states missing parts. When I received the item , the parts have clearly broken off and should have been there. Overall the product looks used but no way this should of happened in 2 days.
